monthly_regional_data.oceanographic_summary: 2012-01 data from Arabian Sea shows average temperatures of 17.8°C and salinity of 35.9. Deep water measurements extend to 1999m depth.
2012-01 data from Bay of Bengal shows average temperatures of 11.7°C and salinity of 34.8. Deep water measurements extend to 1998m depth.
2012-01 data from Equatorial Region shows average temperatures of 15.2°C and salinity of 34.9. Deep water measurements extend to 2004m depth.
2012-01 data from Indian Ocean shows average temperatures of 9.4°C and salinity of 34.8. Deep water measurements extend to 2026m depth. Cool waters suggest high latitude or deep water influence.
